title: Retry production rebuild and republish (no functional changes)

requirements.summary: Trigger a fresh production build/redeploy from the current repo state without introducing functional changes, ensuring latest committed fixes (including “All areas” room visibility) are included.
acceptanceCriteria: A new production build is triggered using the current repo state with no feature/code changes required for this request.
Production deployment completes successfully (no deployment error).
The deployed production build reflects the latest committed fixes, including the "All areas" rooms visibility behavior.

file_operations.description: Update only the existing non-functional redeploy marker comment (e.g., timestamp) to force a new frontend build while keeping runtime behavior unchanged. Do not modify routing, component logic, or UI behavior.
